description: The pair were strolling in the French Alsace region when they came across a tiny capsule.
title: Pigeon message found over a century after sent by German soldier
title_page: Pigeon message found over a century after sent by German soldier - BBC News
maintext: Describing the find as "super-rare", he told the paper the capsule was likely to have come to the surface of the soil over time as have many military remains from the First World War.
